rape.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to force someone to have sex, especially by using violence
rape.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: She had been raped and stabbed.
rape.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: the crime of forcing someone to have sex, especially by using violence
rape.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Police are investigating a series of violent rapes in the town.
He was arrested and charged with rape.
He always denied that he was guilty of rape.
the gang rape of a 17-year-old girl
He was convicted of attempted rape.
rape.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: a European plant with yellow flowers, grown as animal food and for its oil
